Articles.Content: Is there any add on that simply removes contract expiry? As in contracts will continue to be offered indefinitely, so that unaccepted contracts will still be in the list after a long voyage.of many months game time. Of course contracts could still be explicitly rejected.

I can't actually look at a KSP install right now, but you might be able to simply change the expiry values to absurdly high numbers yourself with a ModuleManager patch. All stock contracts are defined in contracts.cfg somewhere under /GameData/Squad/... if there's a value for the expiry timer in there, you can change it.
